Generating Figure 3 from "fecal metabolome.xlsx"


The dataset “fecal metabolome.xlsx” was uploaded to the BGI Biosys platform for processing and analysis. The analysis generated Figure 3, which visualizes the metabolic differences between OP (obesity-prone) and OR (obesity-resistant) groups.
